newsitem.title: USA: AMEX says June short interest sets record.
newsitem.headline: AMEX says June short interest sets record.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange said short interest on the exchange rose to a fifth straight monthly record for the period ending June 13, 1997.
The exchange said short interest as of the June 13, 1997 settlement date totaled 171,022,057 shares, up 12,162,827 shares from the previous record of 158,859,230 in mid-May.
A year ago, short interest on the AMEX totaled 126,796,723, the exchange said. Both the year-ago and month-ago figures have been adjusted from their initially reported levels.
